      Returns:

    • calculateAttacksOnTile

      protected static Collection<Move> calculateAttacksOnTile(int piecePosition, Collection<Move> moves)
      Returns a Collection of Move(s) that contains the Attack Move(s) on the Tile passed in
      Parameters:
      piecePosition - the position of the Piece that is going to be checked
      moves - a Collection of Move(s) that contains the legal Move(s)
      Returns:
      an ImmutableList that contains the attack Move(s) on a KingPiece

    • isMoveLegal

      public boolean isMoveLegal(Move move)
      Will return a boolean depending on whether the Move passed in is contained in the Collection of legal Move(s)
      Parameters:
      move - the Move to be checked
      Returns:
      true or false

      public abstract Collection<Piece> getActivePieces()

    • getAlliance

      public abstract Alliance getAlliance()
      Will return the Alliance of the Player object that calls this method
      Returns:

      Returns:
      an Alliance that is either Black or White

    • calculateKingCastles

      protected abstract Collection<Move> calculateKingCastles(Collection<Move> playerLegals, Collection<Move> opponentLegals)
      Will return a Collection of Move that will be null if the Play cannot castle and have maximum two elements if the Player is able to castle
      Parameters:
      playerLegals - the Player(s) legal Move(s)
      opponentLegals - the opposing Player(s) legal Move(s)
      Returns:
      a Collection of Move
